***************
Prerequisites
***************

- Python3
- pip

********
Install
********

pip
====
Preferred method

Install
--------

.. tabs::

    .. tab:: pip

       .. code-block:: sh
          :caption: install

          pip install xdgpspconf


    .. tab:: module import

       .. code-block:: sh
          :caption: if ``command not found: pip``

          python3 -m pip install xdgpspconf


Update
-------

.. tabs:: 

    .. tab:: pip

       .. code-block:: sh
          :caption: install

          pip install -U xdgpspconf


    .. tab:: module import

       .. code-block:: sh
          :caption: if ``command not found: pip``

          python3 -m pip install -U xdgpspconf


Uninstall
----------

.. tabs::

    .. tab:: pip

       .. code-block:: sh
          :caption: uninstall

          pip uninstall xdgpspconf


    .. tab:: module import

       .. code-block:: sh
          :caption: if ``command not found: pip``

          python3 -m pip uninstall xdgpspconf
